TextView.android:text:
Three model questions are given free for a trial performence. Also you can buy model tests.

You've to finish the test within the given time. For each questions you'll get 30 seconds. Total number of questions will be given.

Each correct answer will give you +1 mark and wrong answer will give you -0.5 mark. Final mark will be given in percentage.

Categorized question gives you category based questions.
